meta.title: Templates | Komiko AI
meta.description: Browse curated anime-friendly presets for Playground, Video Effects, Video-to-Video, and Dance tools. Tap a template to jump in with the perfect settings preloaded.
meta.keywords: anime template gallery, komiko presets, video effect templates, cosplay templates

hero.title: Handpicked Templates Loved by Anime Creators
hero.description: Find the template you love and jump straight into creating.

art.title: Character Presets
art.description: Transform portraits into professional character designs - line art, chibi, sprites, expression sheets, turnarounds, and more.

imageRestyle.title: Image Restyle
imageRestyle.description: Convert images into anime, Pixar, manga, watercolor, neon, and 15+ artistic styles.

videoRestyle.title: Video Restyle
videoRestyle.description: Convert video footage into anime, cartoon, sketch, emoji, and other animated styles. Turn real-world videos into stylized content.

merch.title: Merch Studio
merch.description: Generate figure shots, plushies, and gallery-ready character sheets tuned for collectors.

game.title: Game
game.description: Create game-style videos and scenes including Genshin Impact trailers, retro pixel games, Pokemon evolutions, dating sims, and more gaming aesthetics.

movie.title: Movie
movie.description: Recreate portraits in movie and TV art styles - from animated shows to fantasy films and beyond.

cosplay.title: Cosplay and outfits
cosplay.description: Presets that recreate cosplay promos, cosplay trailers, and cosplay scenes. Also includes outfits for characters.

effects.title: Video Effects & Animations
effects.description: Apply dynamic effects including Live2D breeze animations, 360Â° character views, magical girl transformations, Super Saiyan power-ups, and anime/manga style music videos..

dance.title: Dance
dance.description: AI Dance Video motions optimized for K-pop, viral TikTok trends, and stylized robot routines.

christmas.title: Christmas
christmas.description: Create enchanting Christmas scenes with magical presets for festive characters and holiday environments.
